import thunk from'redux-thunk';import{combineReducers}from'redux';import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from'redux';import{enableBatching}from'redux-batched-actions';import AppReducer from'./App';import CallButtonsReducer from'./CallButtons';var initStore=function initStore(){// add the middlewares
var middlewares=[];middlewares.push(thunk);// add your reducers here
var reducers=combineReducers({AppReducer:AppReducer,CallButtonsReducer:CallButtonsReducer});// apply the middleware
var middleware=applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares);// create the store
return createStore(enableBatching(reducers),middleware);};export default initStore;
